name: The Scoop Trials
description:
Instead of questing as a fantasy hero like in the original Gauntlet, you now get to fend off enemies--AKA sugar craving children--as the local Ice Cream Man. Get to your ice cream truck before the kids rid you of any resources, and worst of all your profits!

Keyboard controls supported. Press 'SPACE' to launch ice cream and use the arrow keys to move. Press ESC to quit the game.
